summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TrailMeet outdoor events app. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend loads correctly with map centered on Mumbai, event markers visible, and responsive design working. Minor UI interaction issues found in event creation form dropdown.

ui_bugs.issue: Event type dropdown options not properly clickable in automated testing
ui_bugs.details: Dropdown opens but options are not visible/clickable, preventing form completion

integration_issues.issue: Event markers not detectable with data-testid selectors in automated testing
integration_issues.details: Markers are visually present on map but not accessible via expected test selectors

passed_tests: API Health Check - All 12 backend endpoints working (100% success)
Map Loading - Centered on Mumbai, India as required
Event Counter - Displays correct count (9 Events)
Event Filtering - Filter controls present and functional
Responsive Design - Works on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
UI Components - Proper styling, contrast, and spacing
Event Creation Form - Opens and accepts input (except dropdown issue)
Google Maps Integration - Map loads correctly with event markers visible

success_percentage.frontend: 85% - Core functionality working, minor UI interaction issues

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix event type dropdown in EventForm component to ensure options are properly clickable. The dropdown opens but options are not accessible for selection. Also verify event marker data-testid attributes are properly attached for better testability.
